Error message:
Error explanation:
When performing an 'all tags' search, you may not specify more than 20 tags to join together.
A user_id was passed which did not match a valid flickr user.
To perform a search with no parameters (to get the latest public photos, please use flickr.photos.getRecent instead).

The Flickr API search databases are temporarily unavailable.
The query styntax for the machine_tags argument did not validate.

The requested response format was not found.

The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
You can't search without tags

Tags are a necessary part of searching for images with flickrimages! Make sure that the page has tags, or enter tags in TS or the content element's tags form field. Alternatively, a single displayed record can be used as the source of tags - read the manual for more information.
TS setup missing
The default TS for flickrimages has not been added to your TS template.
Flickr API key not set
You must set the Flickr API key in your TypoScript setup. Without it, flickr cannot be queried via the API!
Photoset ID not set
You must set a Photoset ID in your TypoScript setup, or in the FlexForm field. Without it, a flickr set cannot be found via the API!
